overview: Legendary Commercial Drive shop owner Bonita Beckman is profiled in Beckwoman’s Hippie Emporium. Now relocated to Hastings Street, Beckwoman’s was the place for Guatemalan sweaters and handcrafted ephemera for decades. A delightful vignette of Bonnie, who endears herself with homespun charm.
title: Beckwoman's Hippie Emporium
